body:
whenever the computer has Rise of the Hobgoblins on the table and a red creature, it enters in an annoying loop activating the card ability several times, as if it was cumulative, and as a result it taps all possible lands.

Running Magarena 1.21 on a Mac
author: [arroubap...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103625280116932830711/)
title: Rise of the Hobgoblins

comments.body:
Thanks for the report arroubapedroivo.

We use hints to help out the AI in some situations, so I added a hint to only use Rise of the Hobgoblins' ability once per turn.

Captive Flame is a different issue because the effect is cumulative and can target multiple creatures. I did try a test game using Captive Flame and there the AI did not spend all mana.
I guess what you saw was the AI making weird decisions from time to time. That's an issue that seems impossible to prevent but something we do try to improve.
